talk.utter:
Expecting perfection, especially with a fast growing app adding a million subs a day, is unrealistic.

I am sorry this happened to you, but please give the developers some time to improve.

talk.author: did:plc:5g7yeacw6q2x42msytsc2abw
talk.utter: What is unrealistic is a company not taking user safety as a top priority, and instead constantly posting about how many new users they have and all the cool new features they've developing. That is not a company overwhelmed. That's a company that lacks direction and responsibility.

talk.author: did:plc:bf252v62plcjwurxoboguwlp
talk.utter:
Well, you can vote with your feet if you aren't happy with how they are progressing. Some things take time. They are scrambling to get more servers to support the massive influx of users. 

Do you work in IT? I do, and changes can't be implemented on the turn of a dime.
